content: 16:39 For the fiscal quarter ended December 31, 2021, the company had a net loss of $8 million, of which, $7.7 million or $0.29 per share was attributable to the shareholders of Beyond Air Inc. compared to a net loss of $5.8 million or $0.33 per share for the fiscal quarter ended December 31, 2020.
